input.sentences: today i went on a trip .
we took a train to get there .
it was a lot of fun doing that .
it got us to where we needed to be quickly .
output.sentences: We decided we should take our trip by train.
I had never been on a train and it was exciting.
Once we arrived we had lots of fun exploring the train station - it was a historical site.
Taking the train back was less exciting because we slept most of the way.
However we quickly arrived back home.
